timeline.body:
may need to cover more cloud storage:
- adls (azure data lake)
- gs (google storage)
- oss (aliyun oss) 

or, can we just treat "hdfs" as the append case, all others as non-append?
timeline.bodyText:
may need to cover more cloud storage:

adls (azure data lake)
gs (google storage)
oss (aliyun oss)

or, can we just treat "hdfs" as the append case, all others as non-append?
timeline.bodyHTML:
may need to cover more cloud storage:

  • adls (azure data lake)
  • gs (google storage)

or, can we just treat "hdfs" as the append case, all others as non-append?
timeline.author: shaofengshi
